{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Stinger96 96Boards IoT Edition Baseboard |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.shiratech-solutions.com/products/stinger96/ |ppalt = stinger96 |pp2 = https://www.96boards.org/product/stinger96/ |pp2alt = 96boards |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = 96Boards |model = Stinger96 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (IoT Box) |revision = REV 1.2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = LTE |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, development board, IoT |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = STMicro;STM32MP157A; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 650 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F8G08ABBCAH4-IT:C; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = ISSI;IS43TR16640B-125JBL; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.11;stm32mp-r2; |stockos = Linux;4.19.9;OpenST Linux - Weston;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (OTG), Micro SD Card slot, Micro SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female (Micro-B) |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, USB Female (Micro-B),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, J6
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Micro SIM Card slot, LTE modem, UART, I2C, SPI, PCM, GPIO |addchip = USB Full Speed to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT234XD;;1;,,, SD 3.0 Memory Card Voltage Level Translator;Nexperia;IP4856CX25;;1;,,, Current Limit Switch and ESD Protection;TI;TPD3S044DBVR;;1;,,, Low Drop Positive Voltage Regulator;STMicro;LD1117;;1;,,, PMIC;STMicro;ESPMIC1B;;1; |802dot11_protocols = LTE
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Shiratech |manuf_model = SRT-PCB-01001 |manuf_rev = REV 1.2 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2020 |estprice = 168 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Quectel BG96 |rad1modif = SD (solder down) |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;MDM9206; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = LTE
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[STMicro]] STM32MP157A Dual Core [[ARM]] :@650MHz (Cortex-A7)/@209MHz (Cortex-M4) *Storage: [[Micron]] 1GB (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: [[ISSI]] 256MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *LTE: [[Qualcomm]] MDM9206 (CAT-M1) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port *Power: USB Female (Micro-B) port
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/stinger96-sbc-launches-and-joins-500-unit-giveaway-of-stm32mp1x-based-96boards/ ''Stinger96 SBC launches'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/05/15/stinger96-nb-iot-emtc-and-avenger96-96boards-stm32mp1-sbcs-giveaway/ ''Stinger96 (NB-IoT + eMTC)'' on '''CNX-Software''']
